data.eml:eml: A new horsehair worm, Chordodes formosanus sp. n. (Nematomorpha, Gordiida) from Hierodula mantids of Taiwan and Japan with redescription of a closely related species, Chordodes japonensis

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chiu, Ming-Chung, Huang, Chin-Gi, Wu, Wen-Jer, Shiao, Shiuh-Feng (2011): A new horsehair worm, Chordodes formosanus sp. n. (Nematomorpha, Gordiida) from Hierodula mantids of Taiwan and Japan with redescription of a closely related species, Chordodes japonensis. ZooKeys 160: 1-22, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.160.2290, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.160.2290
